plugin.name: Dependency Source Plugin
plugin.description: Provides utility goal to work with dependencies

mojo.description: Goal that copies a list of artifacts from the repository to defined locations.

parameter.name: artifact
parameter.description: The artifact to copy from commandLine. Use {@link #artifactItems} within the pom-configuration.

parameter.name: artifactItems
parameter.description: Collection of ArtifactItems to work on. (ArtifactItem contains groupId, artifactId, version, type, classifier, outputDirectory, destFileName and overWrite.) See Usage for details.

parameter.name: ignorePermissions
parameter.description: ignore to set file permissions when unpacking a dependency

parameter.name: local
parameter.description: Location of the local repository.

parameter.name: localRepositoryDirectory
parameter.description: Path to override default local repository during plugin's execution. To remove all downloaded artifacts as part of the build, set this value to a location under your project's target directory

parameter.name: outputAbsoluteArtifactFilename
parameter.description: Output absolute filename for resolved artifacts

parameter.name: outputDirectory
parameter.description: Default location used for mojo unless overridden in ArtifactItem

parameter.name: overWriteIfNewer
parameter.description: Overwrite if newer

parameter.name: overWriteReleases
parameter.description: Overwrite release artifacts

parameter.name: overWriteSnapshots
parameter.description: Overwrite snapshot artifacts

parameter.name: prependGroupId
parameter.description: Prepend artifact groupId during copy

parameter.name: reactorProjects
parameter.description: To search for artifacts within the reactor and ensure consistent behaviour between Maven 2 and Maven 3.

parameter.name: remoteRepos
parameter.description: List of Remote Repositories used by the resolver

parameter.name: silent
parameter.description: If the plugin should be silent.

parameter.name: skip
parameter.description: Skip plugin execution completely.

parameter.name: stripClassifier
parameter.description: Strip artifact classifier during copy

parameter.name: stripVersion
parameter.description: Strip artifact version during copy

parameter.name: useBaseVersion
parameter.description: Use artifact baseVersion during copy

parameter.name: useJvmChmod
parameter.description:
will use the jvm chmod, this is available for user and all level group level will be ignored

since 2.6 is on by default

mojo.description: Goal that retrieves a list of artifacts from the repository and unpacks them in a defined location.

parameter.name: artifact
parameter.description: The artifact to unpack from commandLine. Use {@link #artifactItems} within the pom-configuration.

parameter.name: artifactItems
parameter.description: Collection of ArtifactItems to work on. (ArtifactItem contains groupId, artifactId, version, type, classifier, outputDirectory, destFileName and overWrite.) See Usage for details.

parameter.name: excludes
ignorePermissions
parameter.description: ignore to set file permissions when unpacking a dependency

parameter.name: includes
local
parameter.description: Location of the local repository.

parameter.name: localRepositoryDirectory
parameter.description: Path to override default local repository during plugin's execution. To remove all downloaded artifacts as part of the build, set this value to a location under your project's target directory

parameter.name: markersDirectory
parameter.description: Directory to store flag files after unpack

parameter.name: outputAbsoluteArtifactFilename
parameter.description: Output absolute filename for resolved artifacts

parameter.name: outputDirectory
parameter.description: Default location used for mojo unless overridden in ArtifactItem

parameter.name: overWriteIfNewer
parameter.description: Overwrite if newer

parameter.name: overWriteReleases
parameter.description: Overwrite release artifacts

parameter.name: overWriteSnapshots
parameter.description: Overwrite snapshot artifacts

parameter.name: reactorProjects
parameter.description: To search for artifacts within the reactor and ensure consistent behaviour between Maven 2 and Maven 3.

parameter.name: remoteRepos
parameter.description: List of Remote Repositories used by the resolver

parameter.name: silent
parameter.description: If the plugin should be silent.

parameter.name: skip
parameter.description: Skip plugin execution completely.

parameter.name: useJvmChmod
parameter.description:
will use the jvm chmod, this is available for user and all level group level will be ignored

since 2.6 is on by default

mojo.description:
Display help information on dependency-source-plugin.
Call mvn dependency-source:help -Ddetail=true -Dgoal=<goal-name> to display parameter details.

parameter.name: detail
parameter.description: If true, display all settable properties for each goal.

parameter.name: goal
parameter.description: The name of the goal for which to show help. If unspecified, all goals will be displayed.

parameter.name: indentSize
parameter.description: The number of spaces per indentation level, should be positive.

parameter.name: lineLength
parameter.description: The maximum length of a display line, should be positive.

parameter.name: appendOutput
parameter.description: Whether to append outputs into the output file or overwrite it.

parameter.name: classifier
parameter.description: Specify classifier to look for. Example: sources

parameter.name: excludeArtifactIds
parameter.description: Comma separated list of Artifact names to exclude.

parameter.name: excludeClassifiers
parameter.description: Comma Separated list of Classifiers to exclude. Empty String indicates don't exclude anything (default).

parameter.name: excludeGroupIds
parameter.description: Comma separated list of GroupId Names to exclude.

parameter.name: excludeReactor
parameter.description: Don't resolve plugins that are in the current reactor. Only works for plugins at the moment.

parameter.name: excludeScope
parameter.description: Scope to exclude. An Empty string indicates no scopes (default).

parameter.name: excludeTransitive
parameter.description: If we should exclude transitive dependencies

parameter.name: excludeTypes
parameter.description: Comma Separated list of Types to exclude. Empty String indicates don't exclude anything (default).

parameter.name: ignorePermissions
parameter.description: ignore to set file permissions when unpacking a dependency

parameter.name: includeArtifactIds
parameter.description: Comma separated list of Artifact names to include.

parameter.name: includeClassifiers
parameter.description: Comma Separated list of Classifiers to include. Empty String indicates include everything (default).

parameter.name: includeGroupIds
parameter.description: Comma separated list of GroupIds to include.

parameter.name: includeScope
parameter.description: Scope to include. An Empty string indicates all scopes (default).

parameter.name: includeTypes
parameter.description: Comma Separated list of Types to include. Empty String indicates include everything (default).

parameter.name: local
parameter.description: Location of the local repository.

parameter.name: markersDirectory
parameter.description: Directory to store flag files

parameter.name: outputAbsoluteArtifactFilename
parameter.description: Output absolute filename for resolved artifacts

parameter.name: outputFile
parameter.description: If specified, this parameter will cause the dependencies to be written to the path specified, instead of writing to the console.

parameter.name: outputScope
parameter.description: If we should display the scope when resolving

parameter.name: overWriteIfNewer
parameter.description: Overwrite artifacts that don't exist or are older than the source.

parameter.name: overWriteReleases
parameter.description: Overwrite release artifacts

parameter.name: overWriteSnapshots
parameter.description: Overwrite snapshot artifacts

parameter.name: prependGroupId
parameter.description: Prepend the groupId during copy.

parameter.name: reactorProjects
parameter.description: Contains the full list of projects in the reactor.

parameter.name: remoteRepos
parameter.description: List of Remote Repositories used by the resolver

parameter.name: silent
parameter.description: If the plugin should be silent.

parameter.name: skip
parameter.description: Skip plugin execution completely.

parameter.name: type
parameter.description: Specify type to look for when constructing artifact based on classifier. Example: java-source,jar,war

parameter.name: useJvmChmod
parameter.description:
will use the jvm chmod, this is available for user and all level group level will be ignored

since 2.6 is on by default
